Articles.Content:
Hi all,

A few friends and I are running a Dark Multiplayer server. Would anyone from the community like to join us? We'd like to build a fun group of people to play KSP together and perhaps do some big missions together.

Our server is running on a Digital Ocean instance. It's quite fast. If we have any problems with lag or server load the instance auto-scales up.

If you would like to perhaps join our group please let me know! I'm just trying to gauge interest at this point.

Quantum
Hmmm.. Maybe install Bahamuto Armory? Or what was that thing called.. Would make for some interesting gameplay when you would be like fighting in space.

Here's the reddit thread:

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2k61fp/multiplayer_community/

We have a Steam group now and we're growing pretty quickly. Feel free to join the group or send me your Steam ID if you want me to add you as a friend.

I'm writing a client right now to synchronize the latest mod copies running on the server to your client

If you guys want to join, enter the steam group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/kspmultiplayer/

I'l be putting some announcements on the website and system there later today
We're doing a meetup in about an hour if anyone wants to drop in
